parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The unknown [[Side|side]].
<br>Used when the side of a unit is unknown, e.g. for spotted targets with insufficient information.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sideUnknown'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>//soldier1 and soldier2 of different sides and out of sight
soldier1 [[reveal]] soldier2;
[[hint]] [[str]] (soldier1 [[nearTargets]] 1000);
//returns: [[[1557.96,5047.4,1.32402],"SoldierWB",UNKNOWN,0.0155183,soldier2,5]]
soldier1 [[reveal]] [soldier2,1.5];
//returns: [[[1556.52,5050.08,1.32402],"SoldierWB",WEST,0.0211193,soldier2,5]]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[nearTargets]], [[reveal]], [[Side]], [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideLogic]], [[sideFriendly]], [[sideEnemy]], [[playerSide]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]], [[Side relations]]
</value></part></template>
